name: Gondo vs Stage Fright
description:
THIS GAME IS QUITE DIFFICULT SO I SUGGEST YOU CHANGE THE DIFFICULTY TO EASY IN OPTIONS IF YOU KEEP STRUGGLING

GAMEPLAY

Type words when they enter the PINK area.
You don't have to press SPACE to confirm the words!
When you miss a word, you lose motivation.

Purchase upgrades with the money you earn from shows and try to perform the ONE PERFECT SHOW.

In later chapters, you get handicapped words where they carry additional difficulties. Like missing letters, jumbled letters or two options with a fake word.

EASY MODE:  If you are struggling you can try the easy mode in the settings. In easy mode you don't have to type the words that are too close to each other.

CONTROLS

Skip Word - Space ( Can be changed to TAB in settings )

Often times; after you miss a word, next word is also in a situation where it's really difficult for you to type. You can use "Skip Word" in this case to catch up with the song and type the next word instead.
